title: Badlands National Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       The Badlands provide considerable opportunities for discovery and exploration. From camping and hiking to bird watching and auto-touring, visitors to Badlands National Park can enjoy countless outdoor adventures.   Drive the Badlands Highway 240 Loop Road Stop at the Ben Reifel Visitor Center Visit the Fossil Prep Lab Hike a trail Enjoy the night sky Become a Junior Ranger Complete the Badlands GPS Adventure Go camping & Explore the backcountry
